item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: Unbiased mixed variables distance (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.) - Under review - arXiv - SSRN Convex Clustering of Mixed Numerical and Categorical Data (Brink, T. and Cavicchia, C.) Sparse Scaling (Groenen, P.J.F. and Cavicchia, C.) KNN for mixed data (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.
